data: {"concept_id": "phrase", "concept_name": "Phrase", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "Non-clausal word-group that enriches clauses with detail, rhythm, and cohesion.", "axes": "type|placement|function|density", "axis_values": "noun_phrase|verb_phrase|adjective_phrase|adverb_phrase|prepositional_phrase | lead|mid|tail | modify_noun|modify_verb|cohesion|detail_pack | lean|medium|lush", "source_file": "Phrase.md", "source_md5": "994961a532e9f97c9e8ec3dfe052574e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "phrase", "error_id": "fragment_confusion", "description": "Treating phrase as a clause; incomplete sentences.", "fixit": "Attach to a clause or complete with subject+finite verb.", "example_fix": "‘Under the table.’ → ‘He hid under the table.’", "source_file": "Phrase.md", "source_md5": "994961a532e9f97c9e8ec3dfe052574e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"concept_id": "phrase", "error_id": "misplaced_modifier", "description": "Phrase too far from what it modifies.", "fixit": "Move phrase adjacent to its target; reduce ambiguity.", "example_fix": "‘Running fast, the finish line cheered him.’ → move/clarify.", "source_file": "Phrase.md", "source_md5": "994961a532e9f97c9e8ec3dfe052574e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_phrase_placement", "concept_id": "phrase", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Move the same phrase to lead/mid/tail positions and observe rhythm/meaning changes.", "expected_features": "Placement clearly changes emphasis and flow.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "type|placement|function|density", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Phrase.md", "source_md5": "994961a532e9f97c9e8ec3dfe052574e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_phrase_density", "concept_id": "phrase", "cognitive_goal": "design", "task_type": "compose", "prompt_template": "Rewrite a sentence in lean/medium/lush phrase density without changing core clause.", "expected_features": "Three distinct textures; clarity intact.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "type|placement|function|density", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Phrase.md", "source_md5": "994961a532e9f97c9e8ec3dfe052574e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:32:25.366447Z"}
